words1.name: Adiba
words1.translation: yozuvchi qiz, ziyoli, ilmli, ijodkor, ilhom izlagan, nazokatli, tarbiyali, odobli, namunali, iffatli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Aziza
words1.translation: qadrli, qimmatli, tabarruk, hurmatli yoki qudratli, izzatli, noyob. Arabcha.

words1.name: Akifa
words1.translation: g‘ayratli, shijoatli, xudojo‘y qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Alima
words1.translation: bilimli, aql-zakovatli, dilkash qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Anora
words1.translation: qizil holli, norli qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Asal
words1.translation: asaldek shirin, totli, ya’ni yoqimtoy, suyukli, sevimli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asila
words1.translation: aslzoda, nasli toza qiz, sof, pokiza, qalbi g‘uborsiz, benuqson qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asliya
words1.translation: sof, pokiza, toza; aslzoda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asolat
words1.translation: asllik, aslzoda, zoti pok yoki puxta, mustahkam. Arabcha.

words1.name: Afzuna
words1.translation: ziyoda, ortiq, yuksak tutuvchi. Yuqoriga intilgan, qadrli, qimmatli. E’tiborga loyiq, yuksak martabali. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Afruza
words1.translation: oydek ravshan, quyosh nuridek porloq, shul’ador, yondiruvchi, otashin. Ro‘za oyida tug‘ilgan chiroyli, oydek qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Barno
words1.translation: yosh, navqiron, chiroyli, hushbichim, hushqad. Arabcha.

words1.name: Barchinoy,Oybarchin
words1.translation: oy yuzli, oy chehrali qiz, iboli, hayoli, oqko‘ngil, qalbi pok, toza. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Binafsha
words1.translation: binafsha guldek ko‘rkam, nafis, suluv qiz. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Begoyim
words1.translation: beklar, aslzodalar avlodiga mansub, oliy nasab, viqorli, martabasi baland qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Davriya
words1.translation: davr farzandi, zamon qizi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Dilafruz
words1.translation: dilni quvontiruvchi, shodlantiruvchi, dil guli, dilni ochuvchi, yayratuvchi, ko‘ngilga huzur, shodlik baxsh etuvchi, kayfiyatni ko‘taruvchi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilbar
words1.translation: yoqimli, yoqimtoy, ko‘ngilni oluvchi, maftun qiluvchi, go‘zal, suyukli, zebo. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dildora
words1.translation: dildan sevilgan, chin muhabbat sohibasi, dilni rom qiluvchi yoki rahmdil, jasur, dovyurak. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilnoza
words1.translation: ishvali, nozli qalb egasi, nozik, nafis dil sohibi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilorom
words1.translation: ko‘ngilga taskin, orom beruvchi, huzur-halovat, osoyishtalik baxsh etuvchi; suyukli, sevimli qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilrabo
words1.translation: dilni tortuvchi, qalbni maftun etuvchi, jozibali, latofatli, nazokatli, ko‘ngilni jalb qiluvchi, suyukli, yoqimtoy, oqko‘ngil, go‘zal qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilso‘z
words1.translation: jonkuyar, mehribon, mushfiq, dildagi gaplarning egasi, chin so‘z. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Dilfuza
words1.translation: dilfiruza ismning o‘zgartirilgan shakli. Dilni yorituvchi, ko‘ngilga, qalbga shodlik, quvonch olib keluvchi, shavq bag‘ishlovchi, tengsiz, ko‘rkam. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Diyora
words1.translation: o‘lka, zamin, ona yurtning vafodor, fidokor, elim, yurtim deb yashovchi farzand. Arabcha.

words1.name: Durdona
words1.translation: inju donasi, a’lo marvarid; eng aziz, qadrli, chiroyli, nafis, suluv qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Ezoza
words1.translation: hurmatga, izzat-ikromga, e’zozlanishga sazovor qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Fazilat
words1.translation: yaxshi hislatlar egasi, go‘zal xulqi bilan boshqalardan afzal, ustun turuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Farangiz
words1.translation: nur sochuvchi, ziyokor yoki go‘zal, suyukli, shu’la sochuvchi go‘zal qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Farida
words1.translation: bebaho, nodir, noyob, marvarid yoki pardali bo‘lib tug‘ilgan qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Feruza
words1.translation: baxtli, iqboli baland, tolei porloq, saodatli qiz yoki firuza (ko‘k tusli tovlanuvchi qimmatbaho tosh)dek aziz, qimmatli, qadrli, bebaho, chiroyli, zebo, nafis; nurli nur sochuvchi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Fotima
words1.translation: fatiat

words1.name: Gavxar
words1.translation: gur, marvariddek bebaho qiz yoki asl, aslzoda. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulasal
words1.translation: guldek go‘zal, chiroyli, nafis, latofatli va boldek shirin, yoqimtoy suyukli, aziz qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulbaxor
words1.translation: bahor guli, ko‘klam chechagidek dilbar, suluv, sohibjamol, go‘zal qiz, bahorda uyg‘onish davrida tug‘ilgan qiz. Hayoti guldek chiroyli bo‘lsin ma’nosida. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Guljamol
words1.translation: guldek go‘zal husn sohibi, husni jamoli guldek zebo qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Guljaxon
words1.translation: baxtli kunlar, ya’ni baxtli, saodatli kunda tug‘ilgan. Hayotda baxtiyor, iqboli, porloq, tolei baland bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulzira
words1.translation: zira gulidek yoqimtoy qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulzoda
words1.translation: go‘zallar nasliga mansub, hurliqolar avlodidan bo‘lgan qiz, guldek nafis, latofatli, zebo va suluv. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gullola
words1.translation: loladek, lolaguldek chiroyli qiz, lolalar ochilganda tug‘ilgan qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulnoza
words1.translation: gul kabi nafis, nozik va nozli, jilvali gul, yohud go‘zal va nozli qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulnora
words1.translation: anor gulidek zebo, gul chehrali qiz yoki anor gullaganda tug‘ilgan qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Guloy
words1.translation: guldek va oydek zebo qiz yoki guldek yashnagan va oydek nurli, ko‘rkam qiz. Fors-tojikcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Gulra’no
words1.translation: qizil guldek ko‘rkam, go‘zal, nafis, sohibjamol, o‘zidan chiroy taratuvchi qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulsora
words1.translation: saralangan, tanlangan gul, gullarning sarasi, a’losi, eng yaxshi qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Gulchexra
words1.translation: gul yuzli, hushro‘y, sohibjmol, chiroyli, maftunkor, istarali, go‘zal chehrali suluv qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Go‘zal
words1.translation: chiroyli, zebo, suluv, latofatli, jozibali, nazokatli. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Halima
words1.translation: muloyim, mehribon, rahmdil, mehrli, shafqatli, xushmuomala, beozor, suyukli qiz. Payg‘amabarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.)ga oq sut bergan ayolning ismi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hanifa
words1.translation: rostgo‘y, pokiza, sodiq yoki mehribon, g‘amxo‘r. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hilola
words1.translation: yangi oydek ko‘rkam qiz yoki yangi oy chiqqanida tug‘ilgan go‘zal husnli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hosiyat
words1.translation: yaxshi sifatlar, fazilatlar, go‘zal hislatlar egasi yoki omadli, ishi yurishgan yoki xosiyatli kunda tug‘ilgan qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hurshida
words1.translation: quyoshdek husnu jamol sohibasi bo‘lgan go‘zal, suluv latofatli, zebo; oftobmonand qiz, quyosh farzandi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Husnida
words1.translation: husniddin ismiga qiyosan yasalgan ism. Go‘zal va chiroyli xusn egasi bo‘lsin degan niyatda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Husniya
words1.translation: go‘zal chehrali, chiroyli, latofatli, maftunkor yuzli, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Husnora
words1.translation: bezangan, o‘ziga qaragan, zebo qiz; husnda tengsiz, o‘ziga munosib bo‘lgan, mos tushgan go‘zal husn, chiroy va latofat sohibasi. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Iroda
words1.translation: istab orzu qilib erishilgan qiz yoki Allohning irodasi, muruvvati bo‘lgan qiz, yohud irodali, chidamli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Iffar
words1.translation: pokiza, ma’suma, bokira qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ifora
words1.translation: hushbo‘y, yoqimli iforli, nafis hid taratuvchi. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Jamila
words1.translation: go‘zal, sohibjamol, maftunkor, nafis, suluv qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jasmina
words1.translation: jannatning guli, jannatda o‘suvchi gulning nomi, hushbo‘y, ifori kuchli chiroyli gul. Fors-tojikcha. (arabcha-Yasmina)

words1.name: Jumagul
words1.translation: juma kuni tug‘ilgan guldek suluv, zebo, go‘zal qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Kamola
words1.translation: kamolga erishgan yetuk, zebo, ko‘rkam, mukmal inson. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Karima
words1.translation: sahovatli, sahiy, qo‘li ochiq, mehribon, rahmli, qalbi pok qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Komila
words1.translation: barkamol, yetuk, bekamu-ko‘st, namunali, ibratli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Kumush
words1.translation: kumushdek yorqin, qadrli, qiz yoki oq yuzli oqbadan go‘zal qiz. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Laylo
words1.translation: tunda tug‘ilgan qiz yoki nilufar (safsan)dek go‘zal qiz. Qadimiy yahudiy tilida: Liliya – Safsangul. Arabcha.

words1.name: Latofat
words1.translation: nazokatli, mehribon, latofatli, pokiza, shavqatli, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Lola
words1.translation: loladek yashnagan, nafosatli, chiroyli. ko‘rkam, go‘zal qiz yoki lolalar ochilgan payitda tug‘ilgan qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Lobar
words1.translation: go‘zal, ko‘rkam, kelishgan, yoqimtoy, nafis, hushfe’l, dilkash qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Lutfiya
words1.translation: mehribon, dilkash, rahmdil, ko‘ngli pok qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mavluda
words1.translation: hosiyatli, yaxshi, muqaddas kunda tug‘ilgan qiz, umrida yaxshi kunlar ko‘p bo‘lsin, hayoti chiroyli o‘tsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Madina
words1.translation: Saudiya Arabistonidagi muqaddas shahar, ziyoratgox bo‘lgan Madinai Munavvara ismidan olingan ism. Arabcha.

words1.name: Malika
words1.translation: podshohning avlodiga mansub ulug‘ martabali ayol. Shohbonu, go‘zallar go‘zali, mahvashlar mahvashi, zakovatli sohiba. Malikalardek obro‘-e’tiborli bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham qo‘yiladi. Ushbu ism sohibalaridan biri Amir Temurning xotini, katta malika

words1.name: Maloxat
words1.translation: go‘zal, suluv, nafosatli, dilkash, malohatli, ko‘rkam qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Marjona
words1.translation: dur, inju, marvaridlar tizimi, qizil rangli yirik munchoq, marjondek qimmatbaho va suluv qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Mastura
words1.translation: berkitilgan, yopiq yuzli, halol, pok, toza, pardali, iffatli, hayoli, iboli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mafzuna
words1.translation: latofatli, chiroyli, go‘zallar ichida yagona, suluv va nafosatli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mafruza
words1.translation: tanlab, saylab olingan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Maxsuma
words1.translation: sof, pokiza, gunohsiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mashxura
words1.translation: taniqli, obro‘-e’tiborli, odamlar nazarida bo‘lgan, hurmatli, e’zozli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ma’mura
words1.translation: baxtli, nasibali, farovon yashovchi; boshqaruvchi, yetakchi, yo‘l ko‘rsatuvchi, boshliq. Arabcha.

words1.name: Maqsuda
words1.translation: orzu qilingan, orziqib kutilgan qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Maxbuba
words1.translation: suyukli, qadrli, aziz do‘st, dilbar, dilkash, ko‘ngli toza, sevilgan, dilbar qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Maxfuza
words1.translation: himoyalangan, muhofazaga olingan yoki qo‘rg‘on, qasr, qal’adek mustahkam baquvvat, yengilmas. Arabcha.

words1.name: Moxigul
words1.translation: oydek suluv, chiroyli va gul kabi ko‘rkam qiz, oyning chekkasidagi gul. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Moxidil
words1.translation: oydek go‘zal, maftunkor, suluv, qalbi pok, dili toza, go‘zal, fazilatli qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Moxina
words1.translation: oyga o‘xshash, oymonand, nafis, nozik yoki yangi oy chiqqan paytda tug‘ilgan yoki yangi oydek suluv qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Moxinur
words1.translation: oyning nuri, oydin, oydindek pokiza, suluv, chiroyli, oydek go‘zal qiz. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Moxira
words1.translation: mahoratli, ustamon, puxta, pishiq, qo‘li gul, epchil, chaqqon, ozoda va saranjom qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muazzam
words1.translation: hurmatli, e’zozli, qadrli, e’tiborli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muattar
words1.translation: xushbo‘y, yoqimli hid tarqatuvchi, atir sochuvchi, muattar hidli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mubina
words1.translation: jozibali, istarasi issiq, lobar, ochiq chehrali, rostgo‘y, latofatli, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muzayyana
words1.translation: bezangan, ziynatlangan, orasta. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muqaddam
words1.translation: oldinda boruvchi, peshvo yoki oiladagi ilk, birinchi bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muqaddas
words1.translation: tabarruk, aziz, qadrli yoki pokiza, sof, benuqson, ozoda, qutlug‘. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mumtoz
words1.translation: tanlangan, saralangan, zo‘r. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muniba
words1.translation: to‘g‘ri yo‘l (din yo‘li)ga kiruvchi; xudojo‘y, oqila inson degan manoni anglatadi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Munira
words1.translation: nurli, ravshan, go‘zal, zebo, baxtli, saodatmand, nur sochuvchi, yuzidan nur taraluvchi, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Munisa
words1.translation: do‘st, o‘rtoq, sirdosh; sodiq do‘st. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muslima
words1.translation: musulmon, xudojo‘y ayol, soliha, Allohga itoat etuvchi mo‘mina qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muxlisa
words1.translation: oqko‘ngil qiz, xudojo‘y, muslima, mo‘mina qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muxsina
words1.translation: mehribon, yaxshiliklar qiluvchi, muruvvatli, hayirli amallarga intiluvchi, rahmdil qiz. Arabcha

words1.name: Mushtariy
words1.translation: Yupiter sayyorasining nomi yoki biror nima sotib oluvchi, xaridor. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muyassar
words1.translation: orzu qilib yurib erishilgan; Alloh erishtirgan, sovg‘a qilgan, muyassar qilgan qiz. Hayotidagi barcha orzulari, niyatlari muyassar bo‘lib ijobat bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham qo‘yiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nargiza
words1.translation: nargis (bo‘tagul) dek nozik, nafis, zebo, go‘zal qiz, ifori taraluvchan. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Nasiba
words1.translation: rizqu-ro‘zli, nasibali qiz. Umri to‘kin-sochinlikda, bekamu-ko‘st o‘tsin, nasibali bo‘lsin ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nafisa
words1.translation: nafis, nozik, go‘zal, nafosatli, latofatli, foyda keltiruvchi, yaxshiliklar qiluvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nigora
words1.translation: go‘zal chehrali, sohibjamol, o‘ziga rom etuvchi, maftunkor, latofatli, jozibali, go‘zal, zebo, tengsiz husn sohibasi, yoqimtoy. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Nilufar
words1.translation: nilufar (savsan) o‘simligidek chiroyli, zebo qiz, o‘ziga maftun etuvchi. O‘zbekcha, hindcha.

words1.name: Nodira
words1.translation: tengi yo‘q, yagona, tengsiz, bebaho, benazir, nodir, betakror, beqiyos go‘zallik sohibasi go‘zal, latofatli, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nozima
words1.translation: tartibga, intizomga rioya qiladigan, ya’ni tartibli, sarishta. Arabcha.

words1.name: Noila
words1.translation: orzu qilingan, intiqib kutilgan qiz. Alloh bergan sovg‘a, tuhfa. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nuriya
words1.translation: baxtli, shodon qiz, hayoti nurli ravshan; o‘zidan nur sochuvchi, oftobdek quvonchli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ozoda
words1.translation: erkin, ixtiyori o‘zida; baxtli, baxtiyor yoki toza, pokiza, saranjom, tartibli, begunoh, beg‘ubor. Ba’zi manbalarada saxiy, oq ko‘ngil, qalbi pok deb ham izohlanadi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Oygul
words1.translation: oydek suluv, go‘zallikda yorqin, guldek zebo, nafis, chiroyli, maftunkor, istarali qiz. O‘zbekcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Oynur
words1.translation: oy yog‘dusidek go‘zal, pokiza; nurafshon qiz. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Oysha
words1.translation: yashovchi, barhayot, umri uzoq, hayoti nurli qiz. Bu ism Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning ayollari Oysha (r.a.) ismlari bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Oliya
words1.translation: yuksak, oliy, ulug‘; e’zozli, izzatli, ulug‘vor, martabali, e’tiborli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Omina
words1.translation: omonlikda saqlanuvchi, ya’ni muhofaza qilingan ishonchli ravishda qo‘riqlangan, daxlsiz yoki rostgo‘y, vafodor. Omina

words1.name: Orzu
words1.translation: ota-onasini orzusiga erishtirgan, maqsadiga yetkazg‘an yoki orziqib kutilgan qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Osiyo
words1.translation: tegirmon yoki Osiyo qizi, Osiyo farzandi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Rayona,Rayyona
words1.translation: Rayyon-jannat eshiklaridan biri. Bu eshikdan faqat ro‘za tutganlar kiritiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rayxona
words1.translation: nozbo‘y, iforli, rayhonday yoqimtoy, yoqimli, nafis, jozibali qiz. Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning ayollaridan birining nomi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ramziya
words1.translation: timsol, o‘rnak, namuna. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rasifa,Rasixa
words1.translation: chidamli, mahkam, irodali qiz yoki pokiza, ozoda qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ra’no
words1.translation: qizil guldek go‘zal, chiroyli, latofatli, ra’no guldek suluv, purlatofat qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Robiya
words1.translation: oiladagi to‘rtinchi bola yoki hijriy oy hisobining to‘rtinchi kunida tug‘ilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Roziya
words1.translation: mamnun yoki maqbul tushuvchi, ma’qul keluvchi; yoqimli, suyukli, e’zozli, qadrli; rozilik, shukronalik, itoatgo‘ylik, mamnunlik bahsh etgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saboxon
words1.translation: tong eli, shabadasi; yoqimli, muloyim yoki sahar paytida tug‘ilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saboxat
words1.translation: ko‘rkamlik, go‘zallik, malohat, oq yuzli go‘zal, sabo tongi shabadasi, nafislik chiroyi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sadoqat
words1.translation: vafodor, sodiq, chin samimiy do‘st, ishonish, suyanish mumkin bo‘lgan yaqin inson. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saida
words1.translation: baxtli, omadli, tolei baland, iqboli porloq, saodatmand qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sayyora
words1.translation: tez harakat qiluvchi yulduz; sayyora planetasi yoki tolei baland, iqboli porloq, baxtli-saodatli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Salima
words1.translation: sog‘lom, umri uzoq qiz yoki samimiy, dilkash, ko‘ngli ochiq, vafodor qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Samina
words1.translation: qadrli, izzat-obro‘li qiz yoki Samin (gul)dek chiroyli, zarif, latofatli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Samira
words1.translation: suhbatdosh, hamsuhbat, shirinso‘z, dilkash va ko‘ngli ochiq qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Samiya
words1.translation: ziyrak, sezgir, dono qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sanobar
words1.translation: hushqomat, chiroy, daraxtning nomi, sanavbardek go‘zal, kelishgan, hushbichim, suluv qomatli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saodat
words1.translation: baxtli, saodatli, baxtiyor, iqboli porloq, tolei balnd qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sarvinoz
words1.translation: tik qomatli, bo‘y-basti kelishgan, sarv daraxtidek kelishgan va nozik qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Safiya
words1.translation: aql, donishmandlik yoki arabcha Sofiya

words1.name: Safura
words1.translation: yulduz, yorug‘ yulduz; yorqin, porloq; shukuhli, hashamatli, mag‘rur yoki sochlari sariq qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saxida
words1.translation: to‘g‘ri, barvasta qadli, go‘zal qomatli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sevara
words1.translation: suyukli, yoqimtoy, qadrli aziza qiz. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Sitora
words1.translation: yulduz, baxtli, omadli, chiroyli, tolei baland qiz, yulduz kabi porloq. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sojida
words1.translation: sajda qiluvchi, taqvodor, Allohga sig‘inuvchi, muslima mo‘mina qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Solixa
words1.translation: salohiyatli, pokiza, ozoda yoki diyonatli, taqvodor, xudojo‘y, muslima qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Soxiba
words1.translation: uyning egasi, bekasi, malikasi yoki do‘st, hayotdagi sodiq yo‘ldosh, suyukli rafiqa, sevilgan yor. Arabcha.

words1.name: Taxmina
words1.translation: kuchli, qudratli; jasur. «Shohnoma» asari qahramoni Suhrobning onasini ismi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Umida
words1.translation: orzu qilingan, umid bilan kutilgan qiz yoki yashab ketishiga umid qilingan qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Umriya
words1.translation: uzoq umr yashab hayoti barakali, chiroyli o‘tsin hamda qalbi toza pokiza qiz ma’nosida qo‘yiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Vazira
words1.translation: ulg‘ayib vazira, martabali, obro‘li bo‘lsin ma’nosida niyat qilib qo‘yiladi. Erining soliha yordamchisi bo‘lsin ma’nosida ham. Arabcha.

words1.name: Valiya
words1.translation: taqvodor, iymonu-e’tiqodli, xudojo‘y ayol. Arabcha.

words1.name: Vasli
words1.translation: visolga, murod-maqsadga, orzu-umid, go‘zal havasga intiluvchi, erishuvchi qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Visola
words1.translation: tilab, so‘rab yurib erishilgan, kutib yetishilgan qiz yoki husnijamol, go‘zal, latofatli, suluv, chiroyli qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Yasmina
words1.translation: jannatning guli, jannatda o‘suvchi gulning nomi, hushbo‘y, ifori kuchli chiroyli gul. Arabcha. (fors-tojikcha-Jasmina)

words1.name: Yorqinoy
words1.translation: hayoti nurli va oydek suluv qiz yoki mehribon dilkash qiz. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Yulduz
words1.translation: yulduzdek yorug‘ yuzli, nurli, chiroyli, latofatli va suluv qiz. Tolei yulduzdek yuksak va iqboli porloq, hayoti nurga to‘la bo‘lsin. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Zaynab
words1.translation: to‘lachadan kelgan, semiz, durkun; kelishgan, go‘zal. Zaynab nomi Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.) qizlarining ismi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zaynura
words1.translation: go‘zal, zebo qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zamira
words1.translation: oliyjanob, vijdonli, pokdomon, iboli, ifffatli, pokiza qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zarina
words1.translation: zarli, oltinli, zarlangan, zarrin, chiroyli, go‘zal, ko‘z qamashtiruvchi husn sohibasi, suluv qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Zarnigor
words1.translation: tilloga bezangan, zeblangan, bebaho, qadri baland, zarrin yoki sochlari tillodek jilvali, tovlanib turuvchi, chiroyli, maftunkor qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Zarifa
words1.translation: pokiza, ma’suma, iffatli, nozik ta’b, fahm-farosatli, aqlli, oriyatli, hayo-iboli, munis, xushfahm qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zaxro
words1.translation: yorqin, ravshan, oq yuzli. Nurli, porloq, nur taratuvchi yoki intiluvchi, havas qiluvchi, oldinga intiluvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zebiniso
words1.translation: ayollarning eng go‘zali, zebosi, zebu-ziynati, latofati, jozibali, maftun qiluvchi, o‘ziga rom etuvchi chiroyda teng yo‘q qiz.  Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Zebo
words1.translation: chiroyli, go‘zal, suluv, husni jamoli nafis qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Zulfiya
words1.translation: sochi o‘ralib tug‘ilgan, jingalak, jilvakor sochli qiz, suluv, latofatli, maftunkor zebo. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Ziyoda
words1.translation: qizlari yetarli (ziyoda) bo‘ldi, endigisi o‘g‘il bo‘lsin yoki umri ziyoda, uzun bo‘lsin, baxtli bo‘lsin. Badanda ortiqcha belgisi, ortig‘i bo‘lsa ham bu ism qo‘yiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zilola
words1.translation: tiniq buloq suvidek pokiza, sof, toza, beg‘ubor oqila qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zinnura
words1.translation: nurli, ravshan, chiroyli, dilbar qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ziroat
words1.translation: hosil, hosila. Mo‘l-ko‘lchilik, qut-baraka olib keluvchi qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zoxida
words1.translation: dindor, xudojo‘y, mo‘mina ayol. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zulayxo
words1.translation: kichik, kenja qiz. Ism ma’nosi turli ko‘rinishda keladi. Ba’zilar sirg‘anchiq, silliq, muloyim deb ham talqin qilishgan. Yusuf payg‘ambarning ayollarining ismi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zulxumor
words1.translation: xumorli, qo‘msalgan, orziqib, intizor bo‘lib kutilgan qiz yoki dilbar, maftunkor, jozibali, ishvali, o‘ziga rom etuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zumrad
words1.translation: yashil tusli qimmatbaho tosh, zumraddek qimmatli, bebaho, noyob, zebo, latofatli, suluv qiz yoki ko‘k ko‘zli qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shaxzoda
words1.translation: shoh farzandi, shohlar nasliga mansub qiz. Yuqori martabali, mehribon, ko‘ngli toza obro‘-e’tiborli bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shaxina
words1.translation: shohlar avlodi vakillaridek mard, jasur, ziyrak, dovyurak, qo‘rqmas qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shaxlo
words1.translation: katta qora ko‘zli qiz, qora ko‘zli go‘zal, chiroyli, suluv, maftunkor qiz. Arabcha.

words1.name: Shaxnoza
words1.translation: shohona, beklarcha yoki nozli karashmali, latofatli. Shohlar, aslzodalar avlodiga mansub nozik va zebo go‘zal qiz. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shaxrizoda
words1.translation: shohlar, aslzodalar nasliga mansub ko‘rkam, chiroyli qomatli qiz; podshohzoda, shohzoda, viqorli. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shirin
words1.translation: totli, chuchuk, lazzatli. Aziz, yoqimli, suyukli. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shodiya
words1.translation: shodon, quvnoq, baxtiyor qiz. Shodlik, xursandchilik kuni tug‘ilgan qiz. Odamlarga shodlik olib keluvchi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shoira
words1.translation: so‘zga chechan, shirinsuxan, notiqa qiz bo‘lsin. Ulg‘ayib shoira bo‘lib she’rlar ijod qilsin ma’nosida. Forscha Shaere

words1.name: Abdulaziz
words1.translation: buyuk va qudratli Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulazim
words1.translation: izzat va kuch-qudrat sohibi bo‘lgan g‘olib Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulahad
words1.translation: yakkayu-yagona bo‘lgan Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulboriy
words1.translation: yo‘qdan bor qiluvchi, yaratuvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulvali
words1.translation: do‘st, madadkor Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulvahhob
words1.translation: barcha uchun o‘z ne’matlarini tekin ato etuvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulvohid
words1.translation: bitta, yagona tanho bo‘lgan Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulg‘ani
words1.translation: boy, ehtiyojsiz, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulg‘afur
words1.translation: gunohlarni yashirib, jazo bermay turuvchining, ya’ni Alloh Taoloning quli, bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulg‘affor
words1.translation: gunohlarni yashirib, jazo bermay turuvchining, ya’ni Alloh Taoloning quli, bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abduljabbor
words1.translation: bandalarining ishlarini isloh qiluvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abduljalil
words1.translation: barcha jihatdan mukammal va go‘zal ulug‘ Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulkarim
words1.translation: karim qiluvchi, saxovat ko‘rsatuvchi va bandalarining gunohlarini kechiruvchi, avf etuvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulqahhor
words1.translation: barchani bo‘ysinduruvchi g‘olibning, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulqodir
words1.translation: mislsiz kuch-qudrat egasining, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdullatif
words1.translation: lutfu ehson, cheksiz marhamatlar sohibi bo‘lgan Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulloh
words1.translation: Allohning quli, suyukli bandasi. Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning otalarining ismi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulmalik
words1.translation: molikning, podshohning, ya’ni Allohning quli, itoatkor bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulfattoh
words1.translation: hukm etuvchining yoki rahmat xazinalarini ochuvchi va unga yo‘l ko‘rsatuvchining, ya’ni Allohning quli; doimo g‘olib va muzaffarning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulholiq
words1.translation: yaratuvchining, dunyoga keltiruvchining, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulhay
words1.translation: abadiy tirik Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulhakim
words1.translation: tengsiz aql va hikmat sohibining, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulxamid
words1.translation: hamdu sanoga, maqtovga sazovor Zotning, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulhafiz
words1.translation: o‘z panohida saqlaguvchining, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdulmajid
words1.translation: ne’matli va sharafi bepayonning, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdurrazzoq
words1.translation: barcha tirik mavjudodga rizq beruvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdurrauf
words1.translation: o‘ta mehribon, muruvvati cheksiz, ya’ni Allohning quli. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdurrahiym
words1.translation: rahmli Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdurrahmon
words1.translation: o‘ta mehribon Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdurrashid
words1.translation: barcha ishlari to‘g‘ri chiquvchi Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abdussamad
words1.translation: hojatbaror Allohning bandasi. Arabcha

words1.name: Abror
words1.translation: pokiza, toza qalbli, solih, taqvodor, iymonli; yaxshi, go‘zal hulq-atvor va fe’l egasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Abbos
words1.translation: qovog‘i soliq, xo‘mraygan, jiddiy. Ba’zi bolalar shu holatda tug‘iladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Avaz
words1.translation: avval turmagan bolalarning o‘rniga, evaziga kelgan bola. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Azamat
words1.translation: ulug‘, mard, jasur, qudratli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Aziz
words1.translation: qadrli, qimmatli, tabarruk, hurmatli yoki qudratli, qimmatli, noyob. Arabcha.

words1.name: Akmal
words1.translation: yetuk, barkamol, mukammal va benuqson ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Akram
words1.translation: eng sahiy, o‘ta karamli, muruvvatli, jo‘mard, qo‘li ochiq, mehribon, hayirli ishlarga polvon, bag‘ri keng. Arabcha.

words1.name: Alisher
words1.translation: sherdek jasur, dovyurak bo‘lsin va to‘rtinchi halifa Alidek kuch-qudrat, iymon va zakovat egasi bo‘lsin. Arabcha, Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Arslon
words1.translation: arslondek ya’ni sherdek qudratli, dovyurak, qo‘rqmas bo‘lsin. O‘zbekcha, tojikcha, tatarcha va boshqalar.

words1.name: Asad
words1.translation: Asad oyida tug‘ilgan bola yoki Sherdek qudratli, qo‘rqmas, dovyurak bo‘lsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asadulloh
words1.translation: Allohning sherdek qudratli, dovyurak, jasur bandasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asilbek
words1.translation: beklar avlodiga mansub aslzoda bola. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: A’zam
words1.translation: buyuk, qudratli, yengilmas. Arabcha.

words1.name: Anas
words1.translation: do‘st, yo‘ldosh, hamroh yoki shodlik, quvonch. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ansor
words1.translation: yordamchi, maslakdosh. Bu yerda payg‘ambarga ko‘makdosh bo‘lganlar ko‘zda tutiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Asomiddin
words1.translation: dinning tutqichi, tayanchi yoki dinning ko‘magi, madadi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Anvar
words1.translation: yorug‘, nurli, charog‘on yoki iqboli porloq, tolei baland, hayotda omadli bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Amir
words1.translation: hokim, hukmron, yo‘lboshchi yoki Amr

words1.name: Ali
words1.translation: yuksak, ulug‘, oliy, yuqori martabali. Bu nom Muhammad(s.a.v.) payg‘ambarimizning kuyovi, to‘rtinchi xalifaning ismidir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Afif
words1.translation: pokiza, sahovatli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ahror
words1.translation: oliyjanob, himmatli, mehr-muruvatli, Hojai Ahror

words1.name: Ahmad
words1.translation: Allohga ko‘p hamdu-sanolar aytuvchi kishi, maqtovga, olqishga sazovor. Bu nom Muhammmad (s.a.v.) sifatlaridan biridir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Adham
words1.translation: qora ot; badanida qora belgisi (hol) bilan tug‘ilgan bola yoki qimmatli, noyob, kam uchraydigan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Akif
words1.translation: g‘ayratli, tirishqoq yoki zohid, darvesh, tarkidunyochi. Ba’zi adabiyotlarda “turg‘un barqaror, mahkam“ deb izohlangani ham uchraydi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Anis
words1.translation: yaqin do‘st, ulfat, hamdam, hamsuhbat. Arabcha.

words1.name: Atif
words1.translation: mehribon, oqko‘ngil; muruvvatli, shafqatli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Afzal
words1.translation: ustun turuvchi, munosib, loyiq; qadrli, hurmatli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Afzun
words1.translation: ortiq, ziyoda baland martabali; ko‘payib, ortib boruvchi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Ahbor
words1.translation: xabarlar, ma’lumotlar, bilimlar egasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ashraf
words1.translation: sharafli, ehtiromli, oliy zot yoki aslzoda, avliyo, oliy tabaqa, yuqori nasab farzandi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Bahodir
words1.translation: botir, dovyurak, mard, jasur. O‘zbekcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Bobur
words1.translation: yo‘lbars, arslon; Ulug‘, ulkan, buyuk; Tez gapiradigan odam ma’nolarida talqin qilingan. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Botir
words1.translation: mard, jasur, qo‘rqmas. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Badriddin
words1.translation: dinning to‘lin oyi va nuri, mash’ali. Dinning asl farzandi. Boshqa mo‘minlarga o‘rnak bo‘luvchi xulqi yaxshi, niyati pok inson. Arabcha.

words1.name: Bahriddin
words1.translation: dinning nuri, yog‘dusi, shu’lasi, dinning viqori, shukuhi yoki dinning nurli, e’tiqodli, iymonli, saodatmand kishisi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Bahtiyor
words1.translation: saodat, qut, istiqbol yor bo‘lgan bola yoki shodon, quvnoq. Baxt-saodat, quvonch yor bo‘lsin. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Bahrom
words1.translation: Mirrih (Mars) sayyorasining nomidan. U baxt-saodat timsoli hisoblanadi yoki bahromdek (qadimgi Eron shohlaridan biri) mard, jasur bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Behruz
words1.translation: baxtli saodatli kunda, shodiyonada tug‘ilgan bola yoki bu bola tug‘ilgan kun oilaga, yaqinlariga quvonch, shodlik olib kelgan. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Bekzod
words1.translation: bek farzandi, beklar avlodiga, zotiga mansub bola. Viqorli, kuchli, mard bo‘lsin. O‘zbekcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Bahtbek
words1.translation: beklar avlodiga mansub baxtli, saodatli bola ma’nosida. Forscha, qozog‘cha.

words1.name: Boymurod
words1.translation: boy-badavlat bola, ulg‘ayib murodiga yetsin. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Bekmurod
words1.translation: beklar avlodiga mansub murod-maqsadli bola berk (mustahkam) bo‘lsin va ulg‘ayib murod-maqsadiga yetsin. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Bilol
words1.translation: uch kunlik oy, yangi tug‘ilgan oy, (Hilol) yoki sog‘lom bola. Payg‘ambar Muhammad (s.a.v.) ning sahobalaridan biri bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Burhon
words1.translation: dalil, asos, isbot. O‘rta asrlar hukmdorlari o‘zlarini Burhoniddin, ya’ni dinning dalili, himoyachisi, dinni asrovchi deb yuritishgan va bu so‘z ularning fahriy unvoni bo‘lgan. Burhoniddin ismining qisqargan shakli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Davron
words1.translation: davr sursin, umri shodon, baxtiyor o‘tsin, davrining, zamonasining baxtiyor farzandi bo‘lsin ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Dilmurod
words1.translation: dildagi murodga, orzuga yetkazgan bola. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Diyor
words1.translation: o‘lka, ona yurt, vatan farzandi, diyoriga, eliga vafodor. Vatani uchun jonini fido qilishga tayyor bo‘lsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Dovud
words1.translation: mehrli, mehribon, dildan sevuvchi, suyukli, chin do‘st yoki shifo beruvchi, sog‘aytiruvchi. Dovud payg‘ambarning ismlari. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Doniyor
words1.translation: yaqin inson, bilimli inson, do‘st, Allohning ehsoni, sovg‘asi, marxamati. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Doston
words1.translation: dovrug‘i tillarda doston bo‘lgan, taniqli, mashhur. Bu nom Rustamning otasi Zolning (Firdavsiyning «Shohnoma» dostoni qahramoni) laqabi bo‘lgan. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Erkin
words1.translation: hur, ozod, erkin, mustaqil, hech kimga qaram yoki to’be bo‘lmagan bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Elbek
words1.translation: elning boshlig‘i, sardori, yo‘lboshchisi. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Eldor
words1.translation: ulg‘ayib yuqori martabalar egasi, elning yo‘lboshchisi, rahnamosi, hukmdori, yetakchisi bo‘lsin. O‘zbekcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Elmurod
words1.translation: o‘z elining orzusi, umidi bo‘lgan bola, elini orzu-murodiga erishtirsin. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Elnur
words1.translation: elga nur sochuvchi, foyda keltiruvchi, vatani rivojiga katta hissa qo‘shuvchi, elparvar. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Elyor
words1.translation: elning dusti, hamdami, vatanparvar. O‘zbekcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Fazliddin
words1.translation: dinning yuksakligi, yoki dinning marhamati, in’omi, tuhfasi, fazliga yetishganligi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Fahriddin
words1.translation: dinning faxri, iftixori, shavkati, shoniu-sharafi, g‘ururi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Farruh
words1.translation: baxtiyor, yuzidan nur yog‘iluvchi, ochiq chehrali, chiroyli ko‘rkam. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Fayzbek
words1.translation: beklar avlodiga mansub fayz-barakali, omadli, saxovatli bola ma’nosida. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Fozil
words1.translation: bilimdon, dono, zukko, donishmand. Fozil

words1.name: Fayziddin
words1.translation: dinga foyda, yaxshilik, fayz keltiruvchi bola yoki dinning muruvvati, shafqati. Arabcha.

words1.name: Farhod
words1.translation: aqlli, zukko, fahm-farosatli, dono yigit. Alisher Navoiyning “Farhod va Shirin” asari qahramoni Farhoddek tog‘ni talqon qiluvchi bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Firdavs
words1.translation: jannat bog‘i, jannat, sakkizinchi jannat nomi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Fitrat
words1.translation: tabiiy, tug‘ma; aqlu farosatli, aqlli, dono. Arabcha.

words1.name: Fotih
words1.translation: g‘olib, muzaffar; jasur, mard. Arabcha.

words1.name: G‘afur
words1.translation: rahmdil, marhamatli, mag‘firatli. Bu nom Allohning sifatlaridan birdir. Asli: Abdulg‘afur. Arabcha.

words1.name: G‘affor
words1.translation: rahmdil, mehribon, shafqatli. Bu nom Allohning sifatlaridan biridir. Asli: Abdulg‘affor. Arabcha.

words1.name: G‘iyos
words1.translation: yordam, ko‘mak, suyanch; yordamchi, suyanchiq, ishongan tog‘, qo‘llovchi, ko‘maklashuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: G‘ulom
words1.translation: o‘tmishda hukmronlar saroyidagi yosh xizmatkor; «G‘ulom» so‘zi bilan boshlangan qator qo‘shma ismlarning (G‘ulomali, G‘ulomiddin) qisqargan shakli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Halil
words1.translation: suyukli, aziz, qadrdon, sodiq do‘st; vafodor, sirdosh. Shakllari: Xalilbek, Xalilboy, Xaliljon. Arabcha.

words1.name: Habib
words1.translation: suyukli, qadrdon, g‘amxo‘r do‘st. Asli Habibulloh. Allohning suyuklisi va do‘sti. Bu nom Muhammad (s.a.v.) ning sifatlaridan biridir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hamdam
words1.translation: o‘rtoq, sodiq, vafodor do‘st. Otasiga, boshqa bolalarga do‘st, esh bo‘lib yursin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Hayrulloh
words1.translation: Allohning xayru saxovati, muruvvati, tuhfasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hamza
words1.translation: o‘tkir, achchiq, kuydiruvchi, yondiruvchi, chirog‘ yoki dorivor o‘simlik nomi. Bu nom Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.) ning tog‘alarining ismi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hamid
words1.translation: maqtovchi, madh qiluvchi, Allohga hamd-sano aytuvchi, shukr qiluvchi yoki hamid

words1.name: Hikmat
words1.translation: donolik, donishmandlik; mo‘jiza. Badanida qandaydir g‘ayritabiiy, ortiq belgi bilan tug‘ilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hoji
words1.translation: ziyoratchi, sig‘inuvchi, Hajga borgan, Ka’bani (Makkada) ziyorat qilgan shaxs. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hojimurod
words1.translation: ulg‘ayib hoji bo‘lsin, murod-maqsadiga yetsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Hurram
words1.translation: hamisha shod-hurram, shodon, hayotdan baxra oluvchi, doim kulib turuvchi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Ibodulloh
words1.translation: Allohning qullari, bandalari, mo‘minlari. Arabcha

words1.name: Iskandar
words1.translation: mard, qo‘rqmas, dovyurak, azamat, pahlavon, jasurlarning sardori yoki himoya qiluvchi, asrovchi, muhofazakor. Buyuk sarakarda Iskandardek bo‘lsin ma’nosida qo‘yiladi. Yunoncha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Iqbol
words1.translation: baxtu saodat, porloq kelajak, yorqin hayot. Arabcha.

words1.name: Islom
words1.translation: o‘zini Allohning ixtiyoriga topshirish, itoatkor. Islomga bo‘ysungan. Mo‘min. musulmon. Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.) olib kelgan din nomi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Isroil
words1.translation: Alloh yo‘lida kurashuvchi, Allohga itoat qiluvchi. Islomda Azroil o‘lim farishtasi bo‘lib, to‘rtta asosiy farishtalardan biridir Ular: Jabroil, Mikoil, Isrofil, Azroil. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Ibrohim
words1.translation: xalqlarning otasi. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Izzat
words1.translation: hurmat, e’tibor, ikrom, e’tirof, ehtirom, qadr-qimmat, mehru muruvvat sohibi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Izzatulloh
words1.translation: Allohning kuchi, qudrati, shonu shavkati, izzat-ikromga sazovor, hurmatli yoki Allohning hurmatli bandasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Imron
words1.translation: tiriklik, barhayotlik, boqiylik, uzoq umr ko‘ruvchi, ko‘p yashovchi. Qur’onda Maryamning otasining ismi hamda Isoning bobosining nomi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ihtiyor
words1.translation: ixityori, erki o‘zida, xur, ozod, hech kimga qaram bo‘lmagan, o‘ziga xon, o‘ziga bek. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ikrom
words1.translation: izzat, ehtirom, obro‘, martaba, hurmat yoki sovg‘a, tuhfa, hadya. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ilyos
words1.translation: Allohning kuchi, qudrati yoki xalqlarning sevimligi, kishilarni qadrlovchi, e’zozlovchi odam. Obihayot ichib, Hizr kabi mangu tirik deb faraz qilinadigan payg‘ambarning nomi. Quruqda Hizr bo‘lsa, suvda Ilyos kishilarning madadkori, hamrohi deb hisoblangan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ismoil
words1.translation: «Xudo eshitdi» yoki Allohdan so‘rab olingan, Alloh tuhfa qilgan bola. «Tavrot»dagi rivoyatga ko‘ra, Ibrohim payg‘ambarning xotini Hojar Allohdan farzand so‘rab iltijo qilgan. Shu tufayli tug‘ilgan bolaga Ismael(Ismoil) deb ism berilgan. Bu nom Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.) o‘g‘illarining ismi bo‘lgan. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Javlon
words1.translation: chiroyli va shahdam qadamlar tashlovchi, harakatchan, chaqqon, tezkor, javlon uruvchi, jo‘shib toshuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Javohir
words1.translation: qimmatbaho toshlar, zebu-ziynatlar egasi, boy-badavlat bo‘lsin yoki javohir toshidek bebaho, qimmatli ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jalol
words1.translation: ulug‘, buyuk, ko‘rkam. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jaloliddin
words1.translation: dinning ulug‘vorligi yoki dinning yuksak farzandi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jamol
words1.translation: chiroyli, nafosatli, hushro‘y, ko‘rkam bola. Eht: Jamol- tuyakash, tuyalarni yetaklovchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jamshid
words1.translation: ulug‘, buyuk, qudratli. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Jasur
words1.translation: dovyurak, qurqmas, jasoratli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Jahongir
words1.translation: olamni bo‘ysundiruvchi, fath etuvchi, g‘olib, muzaffar. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Jo‘rabek
words1.translation: dustlikni qadrlovchi, ulfat, juralarni beki, do‘stlari, jo‘ralari ko‘p bo‘lsin. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Kamol
words1.translation: yetuk, mukammal, nuqsonsiz, bekamu-ko‘st. Arabcha.

words1.name: Kamoliddin
words1.translation: dinning ravnaqi, kamoloti, yetukligi yoki dinning kamolga yetgan, yetuk bo‘lgan farzandi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Komil
words1.translation: yetuk, barkamol, kam-ko‘stsiz, benuqson, mukammal; aqilli, donishmand. Bu nom Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning sifatlaridan biri bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Komron
words1.translation: baxtli, saodatli; maqsadiga erushuvchi; kuchli, qudratli, omadli, tolei porloq. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Kozim
words1.translation: sabrli, toqatli, vazmin, og‘ir-bosiq; g‘azabdan o‘zini tutib tura oluvchi, jahlini boshqara oluvchi. Bu nom shiitlar imomi Musoning laqabi ham bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Kubad
words1.translation: hukmron, podshoh. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Laziz
words1.translation: yoqimtoy, shirin, aqlli, xushchaqchaq, ko‘pchilikka hush keladigan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Lochin
words1.translation: lochindek ziyrak, dovyurak, chaqqon, tezkor bola yoki lochin urug‘iga mansub bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Lutfulloh
words1.translation: Allohning lutfu ehsoni, muruvvati, marhamati, tuhfasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Lutfi
words1.translation: iltifot, mehribonlik; nazokat, nafosat. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mabruk
words1.translation: ko‘ngilga yaqin, xayrixoh. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mavdud
words1.translation: qadrli, suyukli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mavlon
words1.translation: ustoz, valine’mat, muruvvat, yaxshilik qiluvchi. Mavlon

words1.name: Madid
words1.translation: uzoq yashovchi, umri uzoq. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mazbut
words1.translation: mahkam, mustahkam, himoya ostiga olingan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mansur
words1.translation: g‘olib, peshqadam, sarkarda, yo‘lboshchi, yengilmas. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mardon
words1.translation: botir, dovyurak, mard, azamat. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Maqsud
words1.translation: hohlangan, istalgan, orzu qilingan, umid qilib kutilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mahan
words1.translation: eng go‘zal, eng suluv, tengsiz husn sohibi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mahrus
words1.translation: saqlanuvchi, himoya qilinuvchi, himoya ostiga olingan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mahmud
words1.translation: maqtalgan, maqtovga sazovor, dongdor, atoqli. Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning sifatlaridan biri. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mahzan
words1.translation: boylik, xazina, g‘azna, ganj. Arabcha

words1.name: Ma’sud
words1.translation: baxtli, baxtiyor, saodatmand. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ma’mur
words1.translation: boshqaruvchi, yetkachi, yo‘l ko‘rsatuvchi, (ma’muriyat

words1.name: Mirdas
words1.translation: baland martabali va yoshdek mustahkam. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Mirziyo
words1.translation: ulug‘ martabali o‘g‘ilning umri nurga (baxtga) to‘la bo‘lsin, ziyo tarqatuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Miron, Miran
words1.translation: amirlarning sardori, rahbari, yetakchi, yuqori turuvchi, oliy nasab. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mohir
words1.translation: ustamon, bilag‘on, qobiliyatli, har ishga mohir, o‘z ishining ustasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ma’ruf
words1.translation: taniqli, mashhur, atoqli, el bilgan, nomi chiqqan, ko‘zga yaqin yoki kunbotar, shom paytida dunyoga kelgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Murod
words1.translation: murod-maqsadli yoki orzu qilingan, qo‘msalgan bola. Ulg‘ayib murod-maqsadiga yetsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muzaffar
words1.translation: yenguvchi, g‘olib, zafar qozonuvchi: shuhratli, xushbaxt, omadli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Musulmon
words1.translation: Islom diniga e’tiqod qiluvchi; islom diniga bo‘ysunuvchi; xudojo‘y, Allohning sodiq quli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mufiz
words1.translation: fayz, baraka, muvaffaqiyat keltiruvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muhsin
words1.translation: karamli, marhamatli, mehribon. Arabcha.

words1.name: Muhammad
words1.translation: maqtovga, olqishlarga sazovor. Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad sollallohu alayhi vasallamning (Muhammad ibn Abdulloh, 570 yoki 571 Makka

words1.name: Muhtor
words1.translation: tanlangan, saylangan, saralab olingan yoki o‘z erki o‘zida bo‘lgan, hur, mustaqil, tobe bo‘lmagan, qaramligi yo‘q. Arabcha.

words1.name: Munif
words1.translation: baland, martabali, baxtli, tolei baland. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mustafo
words1.translation: tanlangan, saralab olingan, dovyurak. Bu nom Muhammad(s.a.v.)ning siyratlaridan biridir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Mo‘min
words1.translation: dinga sodiqligini til va iqror bilan hamda qalban tasdiqlovchi, imonli, xudojo‘y, mo‘min nomi Allohning sifatlaridan biri bo‘lib, bandalarini asrovchi; ular xavfsizligini ta’minlovchi ma’nolarini anglatadi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nazrulloh
words1.translation: Allohga nazr qilingan, bag‘ishlangan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nazif
words1.translation: pokiza, ozoda; beg‘ubor, begunoh. Arabcha.

words1.name: Narimon
words1.translation: qo‘rqmas, botir, dovyurak, jasur, mard, bukilmas irodali, kuch-qudratli, azamat. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Najmiddin
words1.translation: dinning yulduzi, yorug‘ligi, iqboli porloq kishisi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nasriddin
words1.translation: dinning g‘olibi, dinning zafari yoki dinning ko‘magi, yordami tufayli erishilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ne’matulloh
words1.translation: Allohning saxovati, marhamati, ne’mati. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nosir, Nosirjon
words1.translation: yordamchi, ko‘makchi, suyanchiq, madadkor yoki g‘olib, muzaffar, muvaffaqiyat qozonuvchi. Bu nom Muhammad (s.a.v.) sifatlaridan biridir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nuriddin
words1.translation: dinning yog‘dusi, ziyosi, din ma’shali, yorug‘ligi, porloq nuri. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nusratulloh
words1.translation: Allohning yordami, ko‘magi; Allohning himmati, muruvvati yoki Alloh bergan baxt, omad. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nusrat
words1.translation: yordam beruvchi, ko‘makchi yoki g‘olib, muzaffar, peshqadam. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nurbek
words1.translation: beklar naslidan bo‘lgan tolei baland, iqboli porloq, yuksaklarga intiluvchi, hayot yo‘li yorug‘ bo‘lgan bola. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Nizom
words1.translation: tartibli, intizomli, odobli o‘g‘il bo‘lsin yoki marvarid shodasidek qimmatli, nodir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nizomiddin
words1.translation: dinning tartib-qoidalari; dinning bebaho va muqaddasligi yoki dinni tartibga soluvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Nurlan
words1.translation: nurga, baxt-iqbolga to‘la bo‘lsin degan ma’noda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Obid
words1.translation: toat-ibodat qiluvchi, taqvodor, dindor, Allohga sig‘inuvchi, unga ibodat qiluvchi, osiy bo‘lmagan mo‘min banda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Odil
words1.translation: haqgo‘y, adolatli, insofli, to‘g‘ri, halol, pokdomon, egrilikni bilmaydigan, odil. Arabcha.

words1.name: Oybek
words1.translation: beklar naslidan bo‘lgan omadli, baxtli, oydek porloq bola yoki oybek urug‘i (o‘zbek urug‘laridan biri)ga mansub bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Ozod
words1.translation: erkin, hur, ozod, xursand, baxtiyor yoki ulug‘, salobatli; kasalliklardan holi. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Ozodbek
words1.translation: beklar naslidan bo‘lgan hur, baxtiyor, erkin, ozod, saodatmand bola. Fors-tojikcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Otabek
words1.translation: shahzoda, xonzoda, beklar boshlig‘i, yetkachisi, sardori; ilg‘or, obro‘-e’tiborli, nasl-nasabli bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Olim
words1.translation: bilimli, aqlli, donishmand, ziyoli, farosatli, dono, bilguvchi, xabardor, ilm sohibi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Orif
words1.translation: ma’rifatli, dono, ilmli, ziyoli, Allohni tanigan xudojo‘y, taqvodor, itoatgo‘y mo‘min. Arabcha.

words1.name: Oqil
words1.translation: aqlli, fahm-farosatli, zukko, dono bola. Shakllari: Oqiljon, Oqilxon, Oqilbek. Arabcha.

words1.name: Omad
words1.translation: omadli, baxt-saodatli, tol’ei, mavqei baland, yuqori martabali bo‘lsin ma’nosida qo‘yiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: O‘ktam
words1.translation: g‘amxo‘r, mehr-muruvvatli, oqibatli yoki mag‘rur, viqorli, mustaqil, erkin. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: O‘tkir
words1.translation: keskir; mohir, aqlli, zakovatli, o‘tkir. Bilimli, zehnli, ilmli. Dono, ziyrak bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Qobil
words1.translation: iste’dodli, qobiliyatli, kuchli, yoki yuvosh, tarbiya ko‘rgan yohud orzu-tilaklarimiz bajo bo‘lib berilgan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Qosim
words1.translation: taqsimlovchi. Bu nom Muhammad (s.a.v.) ning o‘g‘illarining ismi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Qudrat
words1.translation: quvvatli, kuchli, qodir. Asli: Qudratulloh. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ramziddin
words1.translation: dinning timsoli, ramzi, nishoni; dinga itoatkor, dinni o‘zida gavdalantiruvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rafid
words1.translation: yordamchi, ko‘makdosh. Arabcha.

words1.name: Raxmatulloh
words1.translation: Allohning muruvvati, shavkati tufayli erishilgan bola, Allohning rahmati, marhamati va iltifotiga sazovor banda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ravshan
words1.translation: yorug‘, nurli, shu’lali, porloq, tiniq, beg‘ubor. Pok, g‘am-g‘ussasiz, charog‘on yoki iqboli porloq, tolei yorqin bola bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Rahim
words1.translation: rahm qiluvchi, mehribon, marhamatli. «Abdul» ya’ni qul qo‘shimchasi qo‘yilishi lozim. Abdulrahim. Bu nom Allohning sifatlaridan biridir. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rajab
words1.translation: hijriy yil hisobining yettinchi oyi

words1.name: Raif
words1.translation: mehribon, shafqatli, rahmdil. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rauf
words1.translation: rahmdil, yumshoq ko‘ngilli; oliyhimmat, saxiy. Bu nom Allohning sifatlaridan biridir. Sol: Abdurauf. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rashid
words1.translation: to‘g‘ri yo‘ldan yuruvchi, to‘g‘ri yo‘l topgan, kamolga yetgan, aqlli, dono yoki qo‘rqmas, mard; boshliq, sardor. Sol: Abdurashid. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rizvon
words1.translation: jannat, behisht; jannat eshigini qo‘riqlovchi farishtaning nomi yoki Allohning yoqtirgan bandasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Rustam
words1.translation: «Avesto»dagi Raodastan so‘zidan yasalgan bo‘lib, ulkan gavdali, qudratli, botir, yengilmas, dovyurak, jasur, matonatli, bahodir. Pahlaviycha. Qo‘shimcha ma’lumot: https://uz.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rustam

words1.name: Sadriddin
words1.translation: dinning baland martabali, yuqori mavqega ega rahnamosi, dinning ulug‘ namoyondasi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saloh
words1.translation: ezgulik, yaxshilik, haqqoniylik ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Saadi, Sa’di
words1.translation: baxtiyor, omadli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sadar
words1.translation: to‘g‘rilik, adolat; munosabat, maqsad. Arabcha.

words1.name: Samandar
words1.translation: «Salamandra: o‘tdan paydo bo‘lib, o‘t ichida yashovchi, kalamushsimon, afsonaviy, hayvon (qush) nomi». Samandar o‘sha nomning arabcha shakli. Ism sifatida chidamli, kuchli, irodali, mustahkam, toblangan ya’ni o‘lmaydigan, yashaydigan, umri uzoq bo‘ladigan ma’nolarini bildiradi. Arabcha, yunoncha.

words1.name: Samir
words1.translation: suhbatdosh, hamsuhbat, dilkash inson yoki suvsardek qimmatli, qadrli, e’zozli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Safir
words1.translation: elchi, vakil yoki ko‘kish rangli yoqut; qimmatli, bebaho yohud yoqimli, maqbul. Arabcha.

words1.name: Safo
words1.translation: tiniq, pokiza, ozoda yoki beg‘am, osoyishta; baxtiyor, rohat-farog‘atli; Ka’batullohdagi Safo

words1.name: Said
words1.translation: baxtli, saodatli, omadli, intiluvchan, iqboli porloq, kamolga yetuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sa’dulloh
words1.translation: Alloh bergan baxt, saodat. Allohning baxtli, to’lei baland bandasi. Bu nom Muhammad (s.a.v.) payg‘ambarning sifati bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sarvar
words1.translation: yo‘lboshchi, boshliq, rahnamo, yetakchi, ilg‘or, peshqadam, sardor. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Sardor
words1.translation: yetakchi, rahnamo, yo‘lboshchi, boshliq; urug‘ yoki qabila boshlig‘i; lashkar boshlig‘i; qo‘mondon. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Sirojiddin
words1.translation: dinning nuri, mash’ali, quyoshi, oftobi. Nurli, porloq, yorqin, chiroyli, zebo. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sodiq
words1.translation: sadoqatli, vafodor, rostgo‘y, ishonchli, chin do‘st. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sobit
words1.translation: mustahkam, mahkam yoki kelishgan, xushbichim, chiroyli. Shakllari: Sobitboy, Sobitjon, Sobitbek, Sobitboy. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sohib
words1.translation: ega, ho‘jayin, do‘st, hamdam, ilmu-fanda yo‘lboshchi, yo‘ldosh. Asli: Sohibiddin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sulaymon
words1.translation: himoyalangan, muhofazaga olingan yoki tinch, osoyishta. Ba’zilar “Tinchliksevar“ deb izohlashadi. Bu ism qadimiy yahudiy tilida

words1.name: Sulton
words1.translation: shoh, hukmdor ya’ni umri uzoq bo‘lib, baland martabalar egasi bo‘lsin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Suhrob
words1.translation: qizil yog‘du, yoqut, la’l. Bu nom «Shohnoma» dostoni qahramoni Rustamning ismidir. Pahlaviycha.

words1.name: Tabris
words1.translation: me’ros, boylik, iftihor, ulug‘vorlik. Arabcha, fors-tojikcha, tatarcha.

words1.name: To‘lqin
words1.translation: hayotda yayrab, yashnab, dengiz to‘lqinidek jo‘shqin bo‘lib, to‘lib toshib yursin degan ma’noda. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Tohir
words1.translation: pokiza, dog‘siz, nuqsonsiz, begunoh. Payg‘ambarimiz Muhammad (s.a.v.)ning o‘g‘illarining ismi bo‘lgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Toyip
words1.translation: hushbo‘y, mehribon, yaxshi. Arabcha Tayib ismining o‘zbekcha shakli.

words1.name: Ubaydulloh
words1.translation: Allohning kichik quli, bandasi. Ubayd

words1.name: Ulug‘bek
words1.translation: buyuk hukmron, buyuk sulton yoki beklarning beki. Amir Temur nabirasi, davlat arbobi va olim Ulug‘bekdek yuqori martabali bo‘lsin degan niyatda ham qo‘yiladi. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Umid
words1.translation: orzu qilingan, umid bilan kutilgan yoki yashab ketishiga umid qilingan bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Umidulloh
words1.translation: Alloh erishtirgan orzu-umid, armon. Arabcha.

words1.name: Umar
words1.translation: mangu barhayot, yashaydigan. Bu nom Umar ibn Hattobning ismi bo‘lib, “choryorlar“ deb ataluvchi 4 halifaning ikkinchisidir. Bu ism ba’zi manbalarda “ziyoratchi, hoji“ deb ham talqin etiladi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Uzayr
words1.translation: kuchli, qudratli, “ko‘makchi“. Qadimda Isroilda o‘tgan payg‘ambarlardan birining ismi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Urfon
words1.translation: bilimli, ma’rifatli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Usmon
words1.translation: siniqchi, singanlarni davolovchi, shikastband yoki og‘ir, bosiq, mard, jasur. Bu nom Usmon ibn Affon (614-656 yillar) choryorlar deb yuritiluvchi halifalarning uchinchisining ismi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Uchqun
words1.translation: hayoti nurli, yorug‘, nurli tolei porloq, iqboli baland, baxtiyor, saodatli va omadli, umri yorqin bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Vafo
words1.translation: vafoli, sadoqatli, sodiq, ishonchli; ota-onasini qadrlaydigan, hurmat-izzatini o‘rniga qo‘yadigan solih farzand. Arabcha.

words1.name: Vosil
words1.translation: ayrilmas, ajralmas, subutli do‘st yoki orzu qilib erishilgan farzand, visolga yetishgan. Arabcha.

words1.name: Yahyo
words1.translation: sahiy, muruvvatli, ochiq qo‘l, bag‘ri keng; yashovchi, barhayot, hayotiy yoki hushxulq, insonga do‘st. Payg‘ambarlardan birining ismi. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Yunus
words1.translation: Iona, Ionis

words1.name: Yusuf
words1.translation: qadimiy yahudiycha nom Iosifning (Yaqub payg‘ambar o‘g‘li) arabcha shakli. Ma’nosi: o‘sgan, ko‘paygan. Yusuf nomi sharqda go‘zallik, hushro‘ylik timsolidir. Yusuf payg‘ambarning ismlari. Arabcha, yahudiycha.

words1.name: Yoqub
words1.translation: izidan boruvchi, sabr-toqatli, dovyurak, jasur. Yahudiycha.

words1.name: Yoznur
words1.translation: yozda tug‘ilgan o‘gilni umri ravshan, nurli bo‘lsin. Arabcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Yorbek
words1.translation: beklar nasliga mansub bola. Oiladagilariga hamroh, yo‘ldosh bo‘lib o‘ssin. Fors-tojikcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Yorqin
words1.translation: hayoti (kelajagi) porloq, nurga to‘la bo‘lsin yoki mehrli, shavkatli, muruvvatli, samimiy, ko‘ngli ochiq bola. O‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Zafar
words1.translation: g‘olib, zafar quchuvchi, g‘alabaga erishuvchi, baxtli, saodatli, iqboli porloq, tolei baland. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zayniddin
words1.translation: dinning ko‘rki, go‘zal husni bo‘luvchi bola. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zayd
words1.translation: tuhfa, in’om yoki ko‘payish, qo‘shilish. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zoyir
words1.translation: ziyoratchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zokir
words1.translation: Allohni zikr qiluvchi, Allohga itoat qiluvchi solih banda. Arabcha.

words1.name: Ziyo
words1.translation: nurli, yorqin yoki baxtli, tolei baland. Shakillari (Ziyovuddin, Ziyoali, Ziyodulloh). Arabcha.

words1.name: Zabir
words1.translation: mahkam, mustahkam; to‘silgan, himoya qilingan; kuchli, qudratli. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zohid
words1.translation: dindor, iymonu e’tiqodli. Xudojo‘y, taqvodor, tarki dunyo qilgan. Asli Zohidulla, Zohiddin. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zohir
words1.translation: nurli, ravshan, porloq, yoki ko‘makchi, yordamchi, dastyor, suyanchiq, madadkor. Arabcha.

words1.name: Zubayr
words1.translation: qudratli, aqlli, dono, idrokli, zehnli, baquvvat, bilagida kuchi bor.

words1.name: Shamsiddin
words1.translation: dinning quyoshi, yog‘dusi, porloq vakili, din nurini tarqalishiga hissa qo‘shuvchi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Shahobiddin
words1.translation: yorug‘, porloq, chaqnoq yulduz, dinning nurli, zulmatni yorituvchi yorug‘ yulduzi. Arabcha.

words1.name: Shahboz
words1.translation: shunqor, lochin, ya’ni dovyurak, mard; chaqqon, sezgir, shiddatkor, qudratli bo‘lsin. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shahzod
words1.translation: shohlar nasliga mansub bola, podshoh o‘g‘li, boy. Zodagon, sardor, hukmron va qirollardek savlatli, viqorli, obro‘-e’tiborli. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shahriyor
words1.translation: buyuk podshoh, shohlar shohi, shohanshoh. Fors-tojikcha.

words1.name: Shodiyor
words1.translation: doimo quvnoqlik, shodlik, baxtiyorlik hamrohi bo‘lsin ma’nosida. Fors-tojikcha, o‘zbekcha.

words1.name: Shukrulloh
words1.translation: Allohga shukr aytuvchi. Yoki, bizga farzand ato qilganligi uchun Allohga cheksiz hamdu sanolar, shukronalar bo‘lsin ma’nosida. Arabcha.

words1.name: Sherzod
words1.translation: sherdek dovyuraklar, jasurlar avlodidan bo‘lgan bola ma’nosida. Fors-tojikcha.
